select u.id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_type, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.password,u.description, u.email_flag,u.phone_flag,u.score, u.sex, u.salt, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, u.last_login_time from tb_system_user u where u.del_flag = '0'
